column2: Etymologies}}, p. 348</ref><ref>Although not given a language designation in ''[[The Etymologies]]'', ''anwa'' is glossed as a Quenya word in [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/wordlists.htm Quettaparma Quenyallo (Quenya Wordlists)] (accessed 29 November 2010)</ref>The word is derived from the [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme
